content.body: Is there a new cancelable promise proposal? Was going through and refreshing myself on proposals and noticed the last one was withdrawn recently.

content.body:
> <@kriskowal:matrix.org> To wit, if we renamed `module` to something like `moduleInstance`, it would also make sense to use `moduleInstace {}` as the introducer for module expressions.

for some reason this started looking like an F# computation expression to me
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @kriskowal:matrix.org
To wit, if we renamed module to something like moduleInstance, it would also make sense to use moduleInstace {} as the introducer for module expressions.
for some reason this started looking like an F# computation expression to me
